_comment: Example configuration for SEM microstructure image augmentation
_description: Optimized for materials science applications with grayscale SEM images
_modes: Use either Google Drive mode OR local mode, not both

local_mode._comment: Alternative to Google Drive mode - process files from local filesystem

google_sheets_integration._comment: Optional: Track processing results in Google Sheets

processing_settings._max_files_comment: Set to null or 0 to process all files, or specify a number to limit

_disabled_operations_comment: List operation names to exclude from augmentation. Example: ["elastic", "dropout", "compression"]

_available_operations.description: All 14 available augmentation operations (can be disabled via disabled_operations)
all_operations: clahe - Adaptive histogram equalization for contrast enhancement
brightness_contrast - Random brightness and contrast adjustments
intensity_blur - Combined intensity adjustments and blur
shift_scale - Small spatial shifts and scaling

_recommended_settings.n_samples_per_operation: 2-5 (results in 28-70 augmented images per input with all 14 operations)
_recommended_settings.max_files_to_process: Start with small batches (3-5) to test, then scale up
_recommended_settings.disable_optional: To use only core operations, set disabled_operations to: ["elastic", "compression", "downscale", "dropout"]
